epics.title: E-Commerce Checkout
epics.description: Implement a smooth checkout process including cart review, payment, and order confirmation.

epics.title: User Authentication
epics.description: Develop secure login, signup, and password reset functionalities for all users.

epics.title: Product Catalog
epics.description: Allow users to browse, search, and filter products in the online catalog with sorting features.

epics.title: Order Tracking
epics.description: Enable users to view their order status, shipment tracking, and order history.

epics.title: Customer Support Chat
epics.description: Integrate a live chat system for customers to connect with support agents in real time.
